text: Mutanen Littafi suna tambayar ka ka saukar da wani littafi daga sama, a kansu, to, lalle ne sun tambayi Musa mufa girma daga wannan, suka ce: "Ka nuna mana Allah bayyane." Sai tsawa ta kama su saboda zaluncinsu, sa'an nan kuma suka riÆ™i maraÆ™i (abin bautawa) bayan hujjoji bayyanannu sun je musu. Sa'an nan Muka yafe laifi daga wancan. Kuma Mun bai wa Musa dalili bayyananne
